rows.label: qev041001_MSG0001
rows.name: Augh! Some bodyguard friend is! Where is weapon?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0002
rows.name:
My weapon? It got totaled by some monsters on my
way out here from New LA. Better it than me though,
am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Anyway, what's the big deal? You get me a new piece,
I'll keep you safe. Just like our contract says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'll just be waiting right here until you get it all worked
out. Okay, fuzzy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Nrrgh! Why is Zazazan running errands for Harvey
when Zazazan is boss?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Friend is BLADE too, yes? Are all BLADEs so bad?
This one is useless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041001_SEL0011
rows.name: Criticize Harvey's work ethic.

rows.label: qev041001_JNK0020
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev041001_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that unexpected setbacks can happen to anyone.

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Damn, [ST:gender p1=brother p2=sister ]! That stings! Then again,
I bet most folks don't meet your exacting standards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0008
rows.name:
Zazazan should have asked someone like reliable
BLADE friend in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0009
rows.name: Aw, ain't that sweet. I'm getting misty over here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Jerk Harvey not taking either of us seriously.
Friend may be right in theory, but this BLADE is
certainly exception![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0011
rows.name:
Zazazan should have asked someone like you from the
start, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Still, contract is signed, so Zazazan is stuck with lazy
bodyguard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aw, you really know how to make a guy feel special.
Look, this ain't that hardâ€”you find me a weapon,
I'll risk my neck to keep yours intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0014
rows.name:
Nrrrgh... Fine! You there! Responsible BLADE friend!
Go find weapon for Harvey so he can do job and
defend Zazazan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Er, please? Zazazan is in hurry to deliver inventory to
New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0016
rows.name:
Zazazan is glad that friend is so reasonable.
Now please go fetch random weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Whoa, whoa. It's an iron sword or bust with me, pal.
Personal policy. No exceptions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0018
rows.name:
Oh, and my buddies will be needing a warrior assault
rifle and a titanium shield. Thanks and junk, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0019
rows.name:
Aaaarrrggh! This tomfoolery frosts cookies of Zazazan,
but there is probably no use arguing. Sorry, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Usually Zazazan get more reasonable bodyguards.
Looks like unlucky draw this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041001_MSG0021
rows.name:
But contract is contract. We just have to get lazy friend
his iron sword, warrior assault rifle, and titanium shield,
in order to make him do job already.[ST:wait ]
